Message.Title: not worth the 13.65, so could get ugly
Message.Msg: I mean if the evil old man thought it was he would pay up in cash with his money. so if dell gets to walk because its voted down, then he gets to buy it at a much lower price down the road. if the evil old man convinces people that his many lies are true and a tender happens you only get to tender a portion of your shares. the stub ends up worthless. should get at least a pop at some point though based on the many lies the evil old man tells

Topic.Title: Michael Dell trying to steal company from stockholders - Go with Icahn

Message.Msg: BUY $13 options for janury 14 by that time mess will clear, MD would have lost and CI dividend of at least $10 will establish. I will collect all $1.65 slips agaist dividend if this happens. Slips expected to hit $5 in a quarter. MD is not buying Co to lose money. He wants to multiply his billions at the cost of shareholders.

Message.Title: Cashless Icahn won't bid for the company in it's entirety...
Message.Msg: It's a little bit'o this, and smidgen of that. How about an ALL CASH buyout Carl? Too much for your money-changer brain to comprehend. Put it on the line, or get the H lost!

Message.Title: When Henry Kravis saw that the TobaccoHeads at RJR Nabisco....
Message.Msg: were trying to steal the company, he didn't dance-around with some piecemeal Icahn-style offer. He simply made an identical offer with the price of $90 share, case closed.

Topic.Title: DELL is worth at least $23.72 per share
DELL is worth at least $23.72 per share

Message.Msg: You can have my 235,000 shares for the bargain price of $21 then

Message.Title: Mr Dell you could have kept your company
Message.Msg: But you decided, back in 2010, to not take everyone's advice and buy Brocade. You were too smart and didn't take the advice of all the experts. Your company would be worth $15 billion more right now if you had bought Brocade instead of all that junk you bought instead for over $6 billion. Dell would be the only real rival to Cisco now, but you were too stupid to see with an ego too big. You could have bought Brocade for $4 billion, the only thing that could have saved you from losing your company to someone like Carl Icahn, but you were convinced you could reinvent within Dell, what Brocade is, piece by piece instead of a turn-key operation and asset. How dumb can one person be? Say good bye to your legacy Mr Dell. For you and your ego gave it away.

Message.Title: VOTE YOUR PROXIE TO SOUTHEASTERN
Message.Msg: Let Carl see if he can do a job that the board and Michael Dell couldn't.
i voted with Icahn and AGAINST Michael Dell.

Message.Title: Letting Carlito Icahn take control of the company is a lose/lose scenario all around.
Message.Msg: Geesh, it doesn't take much in terms of looking at this guys history to see what happens. Take it from someone with prior experience. It doesn't matter what side you are on. Unless you are Carlito Icahn or one of his cronies you will lose everything.
